skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Nurgle, and is affected by Nurgle Authority.

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Nurgle, and is affected by Nurgle Authority.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)

skillTree.localised_description: This vile, mutilated steed bears its rider into the very thick of battle, where any wounds scored upon its cancerous flesh are sealed by the pus weeping from its foetid body.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Nurgle, and is affected by Nurgle Authority.

skillTree.localised_description: Create a nightmare of decay, and let the Plague Lord feast on the suffering and sickness that follows.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic and Chaos are eternally intertwined in a symbiotic storm of malevolent power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(Lord's army)

Miscast base chance: +15% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic need not only wreak havoc at range—half the fun of battle, after all, is seeing the fear in your enemy's eyes.
The Forsaken heed the commands of the powerful, and thrive on the excess of their energy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Forsaken, Chaos Spawn and Chaos Feral Manticore units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Forsaken
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Those bearing the mark of Nurgle exude a sickening miasma wherever they go.
How exactly does one injure further the decayed, rotting flesh of the Urfather's servants?
The armies of Nurgle find strength in decay, bolstered by their own festering wounds.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Aspect of the Dread Knight"
Overcast spell: "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for all Daemonic Missile and Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for all Daemonic Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all Daemonic Missile and Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all Daemonic Missile units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for all Daemonic Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all Daemonic Missile and Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all Daemonic Missile units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all non-Daemonic Missile Cavalry and Artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all Missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all Missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all Missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Unit Upgrades cost: -5% for all units
	(army)

Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units
	(army)

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain: +15% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain: +20% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(enemy armies in region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(enemy armies in region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +20% when laying siege or encircling
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of one’s minions.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: Whole civilisations will be flooded by infection, as its spread spins wildly out of control.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors
